sentence: Long before people started talking about globalization, Coca-Cola was living it.
Coke is in more than 200 countries and for many decades has had a global reach like no other consumer company.
And when the world starts to get back to normal in 2021, the soda giant will be poised to rebound along with it.
As a postpandemic “reopening” play, however, shares of Coca-Cola (ticker: KO) seem to be underappreciated.
The stock has lagged behind PepsiCo (PEP) and Procter & Gamble (PG) this year.
